name: rag-lab
description: RAG Lab - Full Stack Application (Backend FastAPI + Frontend React)

scripts.backend:kill: pkill -f 'uvicorn main:app' || echo 'Backend não estava rodando'
scripts.kill: npm run backend:kill && npm run frontend:kill
scripts.restart: npm run kill && sleep 2 && npm run dev
scripts.check:
curl -s http://localhost:8000/health | python3 -m json.tool && echo '
✅ Backend OK' || echo '❌ Backend OFF'
scripts.logs:backend: tail -f backend/logs/*.log 2>/dev/null || tail -f logs/backend.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'Sem logs do backend'
scripts.logs:frontend: tail -f frontend.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'Sem logs do frontend'
